sentences.sContent: Barely fifteen months later, it has become a cautionary tale of the pitfalls of international mergers and acquisitions.
sentences.sCn: 15个月刚过，这便成了一个有关国际并购陷阱的警世故事。

remMethod.val: caution(小心， 谨慎) + ary → 劝人谨慎的， 警戒的

trans.tranCn: 劝人谨慎的， 警戒的
trans.tranOther: giving a warning about what not to do
